TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IComparable

summary.span: 定義特定通用類型的比較方法，實值類型或類別會實作這個方法，以排列或排序其執行個體。

span.span: Defines a generalized type-specific comparison method that a value type or class implements to order or sort its instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作這個介面是由型別可以排列或排序其值。This interface is implemented by types whose values can be ordered or sorted. 它需要實作的類型會定義單一方法，指出是否目前的執行個體在排序次序的位置之前，之後，或是與相同類型的第二個物件相同。It requires that implementing types define a single method, , that indicates whether the position of the current instance in the sort order is before, after, or the same as a second object of the same type. 執行個體實作是自動的方法所呼叫這類和。The instance's implementation is called automatically by methods such as and . 實作方法必須傳回具有三個值之一下, 表所示。The implementation of the method must return an that has one of three values, as shown in the following table. |值Value|意義Meaning| |-----------|-------------| |小於零Less than zero|目前的執行個體位於所指定的物件方法，在排序次序。The current instance precedes the object specified by the method in the sort order.| |零Zero|此目前執行個體中所指定的物件在排序次序相同位置，就會發生方法。This current instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as the object specified by the method.| |大於零Greater than zero|這個目前執行個體位於所指定的物件方法，在排序次序。This current instance follows the object specified by the method in the sort order.| 所有數字類型 (例如和) 實作、 一樣， ，和。All numeric types (such as and ) implement , as do , , and . 自訂類型也應該提供自己的實作可對物件執行個體，以排列或排序。Custom types should also provide their own implementation of to enable object instances to be ordered or sorted. ## Examples 下列範例說明實作和必要條件是方法。The following example illustrates the implementation of and the requisite method. [!code-cpp[IComparable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IComparable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IComparable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 CompareTo(object obj) cil managed
Public Function CompareTo (obj As Object) As Integer

param.name: obj
param.span: 與這個執行個體相互比較的物件。

span.span: An object to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 將目前的執行個體與相同類型的另一個物件相比較，並傳回整數，這個整數表示目前的執行個體在排序次序中，位於另一個物件之前、之後或相同位置。

span.span: Compares the current instance with another object of the same type and returns an integer that indicates whether the current instance precedes, follows, or occurs in the same position in the sort order as the other object.

returns.span: 值，表示所比較之物件的相對順序。

span.span: A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared.

returns.span:
傳回值具有這些意義： 值 意義
小於零 這個執行個體位於 之前。
零 這個執行個體出現在排序次序中的位置和 相同。
大於零 這個執行個體在排序次序中會在 之後。

span.span:
The return value has these meanings: Value Meaning
Less than zero This instance precedes in the sort order.
Zero This instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as .
Greater than zero This instance follows in the sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法實作的型別可以排列或排序其值。The method is implemented by types whose values can be ordered or sorted. 它會自動呼叫方法的非泛型集合物件，例如，若要排序陣列的每個成員。It is called automatically by methods of non-generic collection objects, such as , to order each member of the array. 如果自訂類別或結構不實作、 其成員不能排序並排序作業會擲回。If a custom class or structure does not implement , its members cannot be ordered and the sort operation can throw an . 此方法是只定義，而且必須有效果的特定類別或實值類型所實作。This method is only a definition and must be implemented by a specific class or value type to have effect. 傳回值 （「 之前 」、 「 發生在相同的位置，」 和 「 之後 」） 的區段取決於特定的實作中所指定的比較結果的意義。The meaning of the comparisons specified in the Return Value section ("precedes", "occurs in the same position as", and "follows") depends on the particular implementation. 根據定義，任何物件比較大於 （或遵循） `null`，並比較是否等於其他兩個 null 參考。By definition, any object compares greater than (or follows) `null`, and two null references compare equal to each other. 參數， `obj`、 必須是相同的類型為類別或實值類型實作此介面; 否則就會擲回。The parameter, `obj`, must be the same type as the class or value type that implements this interface; otherwise, an is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例說明使用比較`Temperature`物件實作與另一個物件。The following example illustrates the use of to compare a `Temperature` object implementing with another object. `Temperature`物件會實作包裝呼叫方法。The `Temperature` object implements by simply wrapping a call to the method. [!code-cpp[IComparable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IComparable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IComparable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IComparable Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 與這個執行個體的型別不同。

span.span: is not the same type as this instance.

span.para: 物件的 A、 B 和 C，下列必須為 true: A.CompareTo(A)必須傳回零。如果A.CompareTo(B)傳回零，然後B.CompareTo(A)必須傳回零。如果A.CompareTo(B)傳回零和B.CompareTo(C)傳回零，然後A.CompareTo(C)必須傳回零。如果A.CompareTo(B)然後傳回值不是零， B.CompareTo(A)必須傳回值的正負號相反。如果A.CompareTo(B)傳回值不等於零，和B.CompareTo(C)傳回值做為相同的正負號的，然後a。CompareTo(C)必須傳回值為相同的簽章為和。

For objects A, B and C, the following must be true: A.CompareTo(A) must return zero. If A.CompareTo(B) returns zero, then B.CompareTo(A) must return zero. If A.CompareTo(B) returns zero and B.CompareTo(C) returns zero, then A.CompareTo(C) must return zero. If A.CompareTo(B) returns a value other than zero, then B.CompareTo(A) must return a value of the opposite sign. If A.CompareTo(B) returns a value not equal to zero, and B.CompareTo(C) returns a value of the same sign as , then A.CompareTo(C) must return a value of the same sign as and .
使用判斷類別的執行個體的順序的方法。
Use the method to determine the ordering of instances of a class.
